name: Circles (itch) (Save_1401)
description:
Made for the

Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3

How To Play

Arrow keys to move.

Take too long for your turn and you will loose a health point. Red spaces make you loose a health point when you land on them, and deal one more damage if you are on them when you take too long to move.

The yellow spaces take you to the next level.

Theme Interpretation

The less time you take to move and the less red spaces you land on, the more levels you can complete. (Less is more) My personal record as of posting this game is 56 levels.
